features.name: Authentication - Login
features.description: User login with email/password authentication, supporting zero-knowledge verification

features.name: Authentication - Passkey/WebAuthn
features.description: Passwordless authentication using FIDO2/WebAuthn passkeys with biometric support

features.name: Authentication - OAuth/Social Login
features.description: Social login with Google, GitHub, and Apple OAuth 2.0 providers

features.name: Authentication - Two-Factor Authentication
features.description: TOTP-based two-factor authentication setup and verification

features.name: Authentication - Biometric
features.description: Biometric authentication using face/voice recognition and fingerprint

features.name: Vault Dashboard
features.description: Main dashboard for viewing and managing password vault items

features.name: Vault Item Management
features.description: CRUD operations for vault items including passwords, cards, notes, and identities

features.name: Password Generator
features.description: Secure password generator with customizable options for length, characters, and complexity

features.name: Password Strength Meter
features.description: Real-time password strength analysis with ML-powered predictions

features.name: Cryptographic Services
features.description: Client-side encryption using AES-256-GCM with Argon2id key derivation

features.name: Post-Quantum Cryptography (Kyber)
features.description: CRYSTALS-Kyber-768 hybrid encryption with X25519 for quantum-resistant security

features.name: Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE)
features.description: Client-side FHE operations for server-side computation on encrypted data

features.name: Security Dashboard
features.description: Comprehensive security overview with breach alerts and device management

features.name: Dark Web Monitoring
features.description: Real-time breach detection and alerts using WebSocket connections

features.name: Behavioral Recovery
features.description: 247-dimensional behavioral DNA capture for account recovery verification

features.name: Behavioral Capture Engine
features.description: Captures keystroke dynamics, mouse biometrics, and cognitive patterns

features.name: Recovery Key Setup
features.description: Primary and quantum recovery key setup for account recovery

features.name: Social Mesh Recovery
features.description: Guardian-based social recovery with temporal challenges

features.name: Blockchain Verification
features.description: On-chain verification of behavioral commitments using Arbitrum

features.name: Shared Folders
features.description: Team collaboration with folder sharing and role-based access control

features.name: Email Masking
features.description: Email alias management with SimpleLogin and AnonAddy integration

features.name: Session Management
features.description: Secure session monitoring with auto-lock and timeout features

features.name: Settings Page
features.description: User preferences and security settings configuration

features.name: Emergency Access
features.description: Trusted contact emergency vault access with waiting period

features.name: Vault Export
features.description: Encrypted vault backup and export functionality

features.name: Performance Dashboard
features.description: Application performance monitoring and metrics visualization

features.name: Recovery Metrics Dashboard
features.description: Admin dashboard for monitoring recovery system performance

features.name: A/B Testing
features.description: Feature experimentation and A/B test results visualization

features.name: Analytics

features.name: ML Security Service

features.name: Autofill

features.name: Layout Components
